subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Owners, breeders, racing officials and whoever else secures a much-coveted pass are treated to one of the most venerable enclosures in American sports: the paddock at the Spa.
snippet: Owners, breeders, racing officials and whoever else secures a much-coveted pass are treated to one of the most venerable enclosures in American sports: the paddock at the Spa.
